name: 海莉·索尔特福德
name_full: 海莉·索尔特福德 Hayley Saltford
introduction: Hayley Saltford has appeared in films Infamous, opposite Bella Thorne, Breaking Them Up, opposite Kelen Coleman, and TRIP, streaming now. Upcoming projects include the role of Audra Baines in the crime thriller, Masterpiece. She was born in Kansas City, Missouri, and received her BFA in Acting with a Minor in Music from the University of Oklahoma.
